message: Starting enhancement task - reading api_design.md and locating get_agent_output function

Implementation finished (lines 1904-2332): (1) Added 6 helper functions for robust JSONL reading, (2) Enhanced get_agent_output with tail/filter/format/metadata parameters, (3) Efficient tail algorithm using file seeking, (4) Regex filtering, (3 output formats (text/jsonl/parsed), (5) Graceful fallback to tmux, (6) Full backward compatibility. Now documenting and testing.
